Name: Tomorrow
About the game: Rescue your bunny from Jaye and escape the haunted station. In this game, the player has to free his bunny from the hands of the artist known as Jaye. He has kidnapped your bunny and hid it somewhere in this abandoned subway station. Try to find tools to progress through the level, but beware of the clown that's hunting you: once he catches you... The tools that you can find are scattered all around the map. Every item has a use, so try to find all of them! Controls: Mouse to look around WASD to move Spacebar to jump 'E' or 'Q' too look around corners 'F' to pick up items and use tools 'C' to turn the flashlight on or off
